title: House of Life
text: This enclave of [[Io'lokari]] healers is one of many spread throughout the city, its members studying together and spreading well-being among their fellow citizens. Healing is just another part of the overall system of barter in place within the city. However, members of this house freely cast [[heal]], greater [[restoration]], [[raise dead]], or even [[resurrection]] for strangers if convinced that a party can ultimately offer something to [[Io'lokar]] in return.
